pages.text: Rattlesnakes don't usually do much, but sometimes they may hunt other tinyanimals. If a player gets too close to a Rattlesnake, it is going to make make a rattle warning sound. If one gets close enought to a Rattlesnake while it is rattling, It will be hostile and it will attack the player with it poison.
Rattlesnakes are prey for Roadrunners. Rattlesnakes can be bred with any type of Meat.

On death, Rattlesnake may drop a Rattlesnake Rattle.$(br2)These can be brewed with Komodo Dragon Spit Bottles to create Poisonous Essence, this one with a Cave Centipede Leg can result in the Potion of Poison Resistance.$(br2)You can use them to craft Maracas too.
